title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields. Integration build 09/17. The current implementation uses text fields on the Project Properties Info page, which looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On the Project Properties Info page, the fields for displaying project information are implemented as editable text fields.
EB: The fields for displaying project information should be implemented as read-only labels instead of editable text fields.
SR:
1. Open the Properties dialog of a project.
2. Navigate to the Info page.
3. Observe that the fields for displaying project information are implemented as editable text fields instead of read-only labels.
